Summary: A triple wishbone shaped object east of M66
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile driving as a passenger North on M66 just North of Featherstone Road I was taken back by what I can only describe as what I saw. I saw to the East of me an extremley large group of three inverted Y's or wishbone shaped objects. These objects were flying in a line formation. The two outter objects were all white in color and the center object of this formation was blinking red. Estimated size of this object from my perspective was as big as a football field. It seemed to hover without moving and was relativly low for an aircraft in this area. This object suddely disappeared.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Sturgis
There were no other sightings in Sturgis on or around August 15th 2008
